name: Infinite Hero
description:
Item Farming in Field and Dungeon! Genuine Hack & Slash RPG
Overwhelming Action and Various Skill set!

▶ A sense of immersion bursting out of high-quality pixel art!
- Meet beautiful maps and various monsters!

▶ Overwhelming skills that give pleasure
- Complete your own set with 50 different skills!

▶ No more Gacha & Merge Equipment!
- Get 680 pieces of Equipment in the Fields and Dungeons!

▶ Real Hack & Slash You never seen before!
- Defeat with your own Control!

▶ Auto Combat and Control, Both are Important!
- Idle with Auto, Control with Powerful boss!

▶ Various Avatars
- Get 150 Avatars and Decorate them in the way you want!

▶ Endless Content
- Dungeon: Get some equipment that's hard to get on the Field!
- Mine: Go to Mine when you're running out of Gold!
- Raid: Battle with the mighty Dragon and Prove your Power!
- Infinite Tower: Defeat Powerful bosses and Face with Barlog!
- Awakening: Win a fight with yourself and be more Powerful!

High quality Idle Hack & Slash Farming RPG Infinite Hero!
